channel.title: Angel Studios on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Angel Studios on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Angel Studios Goes Public: Will Investors Buy Into the Entertainment Business’ Faith-Friendly Outsider?
item.description: ‘We have a mission that we’re trying to reach, and we need to fill up the gas tank. That’s what this process has done for us,’ Angel CEO Neal Harmon told THR.

item.title: Angel Studios Goes Public: Will Investors Buy Into the Entertainment Business’ Faith-Friendly Outsider?
item.description: ‘We have a mission that we’re trying to reach, and we need to fill up the gas tank. That’s what this process has done for us,’ Angel CEO Neal Harmon told THR.

item.title: ‘Sound of Freedom’ Producer Angel Studios Closes Deal to Become Publicly Traded Company Valued at $1.6 Billion
item.description: Angel Studios, which has built up a portfolio of faith-based movies and TV shows and has 1.5 million members of its Angel Guild program, has completed a merger deal to become a publicly traded company

item.description: Angel Studios, which has built up a portfolio of faith-based movies and TV shows and has 1.5 million members of its Angel Guild program, has completed a merger deal to become a publicly traded company

item.title: ‘Young Washington’ Finds Its Commander-in-Chief in Up-and-Comer William Franklyn-Miller (Exclusive)
item.description: Wonder Project and Angel Studios’ origin story on the first President of the United States goes into production later this summer.
